channel.title: Quest requirements
channel.description: I recently started editing a new source and I came across something I haven't seen on a source before, when you try to convert to ancient magic it says "you must have completed desert treasure first" is there a way to remove quest requirements?

item.title: Quest requirements
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

if (objectID == 6552) { if (q3 != 15 && playerAncientMagics == 0){ sM("You must complete Desert Treasure if you want to use Ancients."); } if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Try that I might have messed up on the brackets

Read full topic

item.title: Quest requirements

item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

[quote author=ponqueque link=topic=575204.msg4142332#msg4142332 date=1352088319]
when i try to delete it i get errors, this is the code that is there

if (objectID == 6552) { if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0 && q3 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }
try this

item.title: Quest requirements
item.dc:creator: @ponqueque ponqueque
item.description:
@ponqueque wrote:

when i try to delete it i get errors, this is the code that is there

if (objectID == 6552) { if (q3 != 15 && playerAncientMagics == 0){ sM("You must complete Desert Treasure if you want to use Ancients."); } if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0 && q3 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); }

i deleted this if (q3 != 15 && playerAncientMagics == 0){ sM("You must complete Desert Treasure if you want to use Ancients."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Quest requirements
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

There is probably a character token for the desert treasure quest, and it checks something like

ifcommandtochangeprayersoshdfosuidfhdsiuofhsndf if(player.desertTreasure < 10) { "you must have completed desert treasure first" 10 is just an example, when the variable reaches 10, that shows the quest is done

so just search for the text and delete the requirement

Read full topic
